headline: PG&E CEO Poppe on Earnings, Rates and AI Buildout
summary: PG&E CEO Patti Poppe discusses the company's third-quarter earnings, its role in the AI buildout and the preparations for potential wildfires. She speaks with Romaine Bostick on "Bloomberg The Close."

headline: PG&E (PCG) Q3 Earnings Beat Estimates
summary: PG&E (PCG) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +13.64% and -4.26%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: PG&E narrows 2025 guidance and unveils 2026 outlook; Q3 results mixed
summary: Investing.com -- PG&E Corp. reported stronger-than-expected third-quarter earnings, while revenue missed consensus estimates. The utility also narrowed its 2025 guidance range and introduced its outlook for 2026.

headline: PG&E: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: OAKLAND, Calif. AP) — Pacific Gas & Electric Co. (PCG) on Thursday reported third-quarter profit of $850 million. On a per-share basis, the Oakland, California-based company said it had profit of 37 cents.

raw.headline: PG&E: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: OAKLAND, Calif. AP) — Pacific Gas & Electric Co. (PCG) on Thursday reported third-quarter profit of $850 million. On a per-share basis, the Oakland, California-based company said it had profit of 37 cents.
